name: NecromanZer 7DRL
description:
NecromanZer is a rogue-like game where you can excavate bodies from a graveyard and animate them to join your army of death. You can chop limbs of the bodies and construct your own Frankenstein`s monsters. You can kill villagers, butcher them and use their limbs too.

Quick start:

  • Move to graveyard using arrows, numpad or number keys 
  • Find a shovel using [V] (shift + v) to show nearest items
  • Wield a shovel using [w]
  • Read the gravestones using [r] and find one with suitable body
  • Dig a grave using [D] (shift + d)
  • Examine a body using [e]
  • Animate the body using [a]
  • Give the order to your new soldier using [O] (shift + o) to follow you
  • Go to the village by a gravel road
  • Use your cadaver to kill villagers or try to kill them yourself using [s] to smash
  • Use villagers limbs (removed by [x] in body view) to construct your Frankenstein's monsters (use [i] to install new limbs slots and [r] to install limbs to existed slots)
  • Kill the whole village and think about what you are doing with your life
